summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bloomy Essentials Organic Lavender Essential Oil 10 mL (1/3 oz) - USDA Certified Organic - Aromatherapy for Relaxation, Peaceful Sleep, Stress & Anxiety Relief, Meditation, Massage - 100% Pure
Review Date: 2020/04/27
Store: Bloomy Essentials
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bloomy Essentials', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Special Feature': 'Aromatherapy, Pure', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters'}
Review Text: This essential oil smells just as good as any other brand I have tried. The lavender is potent enough to know the scent but not overpowering.
Review Title: Fresh Scent
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 36 Pack 2oz Clear Plastic Empty Bottles Travel Containers with Flip Cap for Hand Sanitizer, Cosmetic, Shampoo, Lotion, Liquid Body Soap, Cream, Toner, BPA-free
Review Date: 2020/12/31
Store: JIUZHU
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '12.09 x 10.28 x 3.07 inches; 13.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '667322945817'}
Review Text: These bottles are small and lightweight and perfect for traveling.  They seem to be made well, and durable quality.
Review Title: Great multipurpose  bottles
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: UJM Magnetic Eyelashes 10 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelash and Eyeliner Kit Natural Look False Lashes with Tweezers No Glue Needed Waterproof Magnetic Lashes
Review Date: 2021/01/13
Store: UJM
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'UJM', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '8 x 4 x 0.4 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 0.4 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'UJM-010'}
Review Text: I love these magnetic lashes! They are perfect for beginners like me, easy to use and they stay on well.
Review Title: Great Magentic Lashes
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy
Review Date: 2021/01/16
Store: AYL
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'}
Review Text: Arag safely, everything I expected. Nice size glass bottles easy to work with easy to clean.
Review Title: Excellent
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Easily carry Electric Toothbrush Travel Case
Review Date: 2021/01/17
Store: KarlunKoy
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '8.27 x 2.76 x 1.77 inches; 2.65 Ounces'}
Review Text: This case fits my OClean toothbrush with no issues,  I just range the head off and place it in the home inside the car.  It's not a shower think plastic,  but it's a good thickness.  It's light to make it day to carry.  It kittens and closes all,  and I love the drain/ air holes.
Review Title: It works
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nail File and Buffers,TsMADDTs 14 Pack Professional Manicure Tools Set with 6PCS 100/180 Grit Nail Files Double Sided Emery Board 6PCS Nail Buffer Block 120 Grit Nail Scrubbing Brush Cuticle Knife
Review Date: 2021/01/18
Store: TsMADDTs
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.96 x 5.39 x 1.02 inches; 3.77 Ounces', 'UPC': '616010018579', 'Manufacturer': 'TsMADDTs'}
Review Text: Looks just like the advertised picture. The products individually look and feel their made of good quality. And it has everything i need to start a basic manicure.
Review Title: basics covered
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Headbands for Woman Pearls Headbands,Logiverl 2PCS Pearls Headband Elegant Hair Clip Hairpins Headwear Barrette Styling Tools Accessories for Christmas Gift
Review Date: 2021/02/24
Store: Logiverl
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'velvet', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Brand': 'Logiverl', 'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 5.3 x 1.3 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '682365963406'}
Review Text: These headbands are really pretty in person,  they are kinda plush and are made fairly well.  The only part that may have an issue is the piece that tests on the ears mat start to come apart.
Review Title: Shower cute and plush
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 10 Magnets Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner, LANKIZ Exclusive 3x Stronger 1mm Ultra-Light Magnets, 5D Magnetic Lashes Pack Natural Look with 2 Tubes Magnetic Eyeliner Kit & Unique Applicator Tool
Review Date: 2021/04/01
Store: LANKIZ
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'LANKIZ', 'Material': 'Silicone,Steel,Silk,Mink', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.81 x 6.22 x 0.71 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Latex Free, Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6.81 x 6.22 x 0.71 inches; 4.97 Ounces'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:9b0299678b3eca2ed34ea58e9a03c714]] This eyelash set is perfect for my style,  I like the basic length,  not too much drama.  And this is basically it with this kit.  There may be one set that had some extra fluff to them,  but that's it.  The length of the glue tube is nice,  it's long and the brush is thick, but not to thick.  They go on easy and come off well.  No issues so far
Review Title: Love the lengths offered
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 18 Pack Hair Ties,Spiral elastics, Multi Color Hair Scrunchies, No Crease Spiral Hair Elastics,Hair ties for women
Review Date: 2021/05/12
Store: Gomayee
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Color': 'Multicolor/Assorted', 'Material': 'Silk, Plastic, Rubber', 'Brand': 'Gomayee', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2 x 2 x 1 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '719986067913'}
Review Text: These hair ties work great for me.  The have a good stretch, and they do return to shape if stretched for a while.  Easy to use
Review Title: Love this style
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nail Dip Powder Liquid Set with Base Activator and Top Coat, 10ml x 3, for Dipping Powder Manicure System, No Including Bond Primer Brush Saver, No Need UV/LED Lamp to Cured
Review Date: 2021/07/01
Store: unibouti
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Unibouti', 'Included Components': 'Top Coat, Dip Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 2.72 x 0.87 inches; 1.76 Ounces'}
Review Text: These basic polishes work well with the different brands of powders that I have. The bottles are slightly smaller than"regular" polish
Review Title: Work Great
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: STARAMZ 7 Set Bachelorette Scrunchies Bridesmaid Proposal Gifts Hair Ties for Women Bachelorette Party Favors ( Blush)
Review Date: 2021/07/09
Store: STARAMZ
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'STARAMZ', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '7', 'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 7.8 x 2.44 inches; 2.89 Ounces'}
Review Text: Love these scrunchies!! They don't pull and tug at my hair,  and I love how they are made to give as bridesmaids gifts.
Review Title: So cute
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Genuine Preferences and Behavioral Trends:**

- **Aromatherapy Focus**: Preference for essential oils, particularly lavender, indicating a strong interest in relaxation, stress relief, and meditation.
- **Travel-Friendly Products**: Shows consistent purchasing of lightweight and multipurpose travel containers and cases, emphasizing a lifestyle that values convenience and portability.
- **Beauty and Self-Care Enthusiast**: Engages heavily in beauty items such as magnetic eyelashes and manicure sets, suggesting an affinity for makeup and personal grooming.
- **Hair Accessories**: Regularly buys various hair accessories including headbands and hair ties, indicating a concern for style and hair maintenance.
- **Quality Over Quantity**: Strong inclination toward products with high ratings, showcasing a preference for quality and effectiveness in their purchases.
- **Practicality**: Demonstrates an interest in functional items that enhance everyday tasks, such as refillable bottles and nail care tools, prioritizing usability.
- **Party and Gift Items**: Interest in items suitable for events (e.g., bachelorette party favors), indicating social engagement and the importance of gifting.

Overall, this person shows a balanced lifestyle that integrates self-care, practicality in travel, and social activities.

target_interaction.title: Nice Selection
target_interaction.text: Love all the styles and types.  They hold my daughter's hair well,  and they stretch and confirm back to shadow pretty well also
target_interaction.title_meta: Spove Spiral Hair Ties Hair Coils Hair Coil Seamless Non-slip Mixed Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women & Kids 15pcs
